Description: Relative offset position 1 for offset movement.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3027:8hModbus 10000Profibus 10000CIP 139.1.8ModbusTCP 10000EtherCAT 3027:8hPROFINET 10000

Description: Relative offset position 2 for offset movement.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3027:AhModbus 10004Profibus 10004CIP 139.1.10ModbusTCP 10004EtherCAT 3027:AhPROFINET 10004

Description: Offset movement with relative offset position.This parameter starts an offset movement withone of the relative offset positions specified bymeans of the parameters OFSp_RelPos1 andOFSp_RelPos2.Value 0: No offset movementValue 1: Start offset movement with relative offsetposition 1 (OFSp_RelPos1)Value 2: Start offset movement with relative offsetposition 2 (OFSp_RelPos2)Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3027:BhModbus 10006Profibus 10006CIP 139.1.11ModbusTCP 10006EtherCAT 3027:BhPROFINET 10006

Description: Target velocity for offset movement.The maximum value is 5000 if the user-definedscaling factor of the velocity scaling is 1.This applies to the user-defined scaling factors.Example: If the user-defined scaling factor of thevelocity scaling is 2 (ScaleVELnum = 2,ScaleVELdenom = 1), the maximum value is2500.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3027:4hModbus 9992Profibus 9992CIP 139.1.4ModbusTCP 9992EtherCAT 3027:4hPROFINET 9992

Description: Acceleration and deceleration for offsetmovement.Setting can only be modified if power stage isdisabled.Modified settings become active the next time thepower stage is enabled.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3027:6hModbus 9996Profibus 9996CIP 139.1.6ModbusTCP 9996EtherCAT 3027:6hPROFINET 9996
